name: TrueMotion VP7 Video File
summary: Encoded video format developed by On2 Technologies; designed to encode video quickly and decode video in fewer cycles than other compression schemes; optimized for playback on low-power devices and includes advanced buffering and latency features.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
